channel.title: oil on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in oil on FinanClub

item.title: Chevron Adds Another Piston to Its US Oil Shale Engine
item.description: Chevron Corp. has agreed to buy Permian Basin oil and gas assets from Noble Energy Inc. for $10.5 billion in cash. The deal would add 149,000 net acres to Chevron’s Permian holdings, bringing its total acreage in the basin to more than 600,000 acres.

item.title: Russia, Iran, Venezuela Confound Oil Output Forecasts
item.description: The International Energy Agency (IEA) has lifted its forecast for Russian, Iranian, and Venezuelan output in 2023 by a combined 1.3 million barrels a day, reaching an annual average of 14.3 million barrels a day, according to a recent article on Bloomberg 1.
